intro.title: How to Enroll
intro.subtitle: Joining is simple, safe, and super easy!

steps.title: Choose Your Activity
steps.desc: Pick what excites your child most: Express yourself; Challenge yourself; Brainy bites

steps.title: Fill the Registration Form
steps.desc: Enter your details below to get started.

steps.title: Make Your Payment
steps.desc: Credit/debit card, UPI, GPay. We can have Rs. 100 for writing upload (bubble 1 option), Rs. 100 per online competition entry (2 entries can be taken at rs. 150), Rs. 200 per 60 min workshop. They should receive an instant digital receipt and confirmation message after successful payment.

steps.title: Get Ready to Begin!
steps.desc: A Google Meet link (for workshops) or a submission link (for competitions) will be shared via email/WhatsApp. You’ll also receive a list of materials or preparation tips (if required).

steps.title: Refund & Support Policy
steps.desc: Full refund available if you cancel at least 48 hours before the workshop start time. Technical or payment issues? Our support team is happy to help — just reach out at hr@eduraglobal.com
